name: Alice Williams
body: Great introduction to API testing! I found the best practices section particularly helpful.

name: Sam Brown
body: As someone new to API testing, this was very informative. Looking forward to more posts on this topic.

name: Michael Davis
body: REST Assured has been a game-changer for our API testing workflow. Thanks for sharing these insights!

name: Emily Wilson
body: We've recently implemented some of these best practices and have seen a significant improvement in our test efficiency.

name: David Miller
body: JSON Schema validation has helped us catch several contract violations before they reached production. Essential information!

name: Sarah Taylor
body: The performance testing strategies outlined here have been invaluable for our high-traffic API. Thank you!
